titleStmt.title: The child's portion, or, The unseen glory of the children of God asserted and proved together with several other sermons / occasionally preached and now published by Samuel Willard, teacher of a church in Boston, New-England.
titleStmt.author: Willard, Samuel, 1640-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Samuel Green and are to be sold by Samuel Phillips ...,

notesStmt.note: "The righteous man's death" has special t.p.
Imperfect: pages torn and stained, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
